title: Linda Green
overview:
Linda is a Manchester girl, born and bred. She's in her early 30s and 
the friends she has now are the same friends she's had since primary 
school. By day she potters around in Craven Lane Motors selling cars and
 flirting with mechanics. But when night time comes around she can 
usually be found singing her heart out on stage at the Lee Lane Social 
Club. Her best friend Michelle may be settled and happy with her 
boyfriend and kids, but Linda's single and loving it. She may not have 
found Mr Right just yet, but she's having a whale of a time while she's 
looking.
